alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 20 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Colorado, including the following areas, Crowley County, Eastern Kiowa County, Eastern Las Animas County, La Junta Vicinity/Otero County, Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County, Las Animas Vicinity/Bent County, Springfield Vicinity/Baca County and Western Kiowa County. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will continue through the evening. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are forecast, and locally over 3 inches of rain will be possible with the strongest storms. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
